weather.sql: SELECT AVG(temperature) FROM weather_data;
SELECT MIN(temperature), MAX(temperature) FROM weather_data;
SELECT SUM(precipitation_mm) FROM weather_data;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM weather_data;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM weather_data WHERE time BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-01-02';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM weather_data WHERE time BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-02-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM weather_data WHERE time BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT AVG(temperature) FROM weather_data WHERE time BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT date_trunc('day', time) AS day, AVG(temperature) FROM weather_data WHERE time >= '2020-01-01' AND time < '2020-02-01' GROUP BY day ORDER BY day;
SELECT time_bucket('1 day', time) AS day, AVG(temperature) FROM weather_data WHERE time >= '2020-01-01' AND time < '2020-02-01' GROUP BY day ORDER BY day;
SELECT time_bucket('1 hour', time) AS hour, AVG(temperature) FROM weather_data WHERE time >= '2020-01-01' AND time < '2020-01-07' GROUP BY hour ORDER BY hour;
SELECT AVG(temperature) FROM weather_data WHERE relative_humidity > 80 AND temperature > 25 AND time BETWEEN '2020-06-01' AND '2020-06-30';
SELECT AVG(temperature) FROM weather_data WHERE relative_humidity > 85 AND temperature < 15 AND time BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-01-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM weather_data WHERE rain_mm > 5 AND time BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM weather_data WHERE pressure_msl_hPa < 1000 AND time BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT time, AVG(temperature) OVER (ORDER BY time ROWS BETWEEN 9 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) FROM weather_data ORDER BY time LIMIT 5000;
SELECT time, AVG(relative_humidity) OVER (ORDER BY time ROWS BETWEEN 9 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) FROM weather_data ORDER BY time LIMIT 5000;
SELECT is_day, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, MAX(relative_humidity) AS max_hum FROM weather_data GROUP BY is_day;
SELECT width_bucket(relative_humidity, 0, 100, 5) AS hum_bucket, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, COUNT(*) AS samples FROM weather_data GROUP BY hum_bucket ORDER BY hum_bucket;
SELECT width_bucket(cloud_cover_pct, 0, 100, 4) AS cloud_group, AVG(temperature), AVG(relative_humidity) FROM weather_data GROUP BY cloud_group ORDER BY cloud_group;
SELECT DISTINCT ON (date_trunc('day', time)) time, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE time BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-02-01' ORDER BY date_trunc('day', time), time DESC;
SELECT time, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE time >= '2020-01-01' AND time < '2020-12-31' ORDER BY temperature DESC LIMIT 10;

synthetic.sql: SELECT AVG(temperature) FROM synthetic_data;
SELECT MIN(temperature), MAX(temperature) FROM synthetic_data;
SELECT AVG(battery_voltage) FROM synthetic_data;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM synthetic_data;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM synthetic_data WHERE time BETWEEN '2024-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2024-01-01 01:00:00';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM synthetic_data WHERE time BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-01-02';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM synthetic_data WHERE time BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-01-07';
SELECT AVG(temperature) FROM synthetic_data WHERE time BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-01-07';
SELECT date_trunc('hour', time) AS hour, AVG(temperature) FROM synthetic_data WHERE time >= '2024-01-01' AND time < '2024-01-02' GROUP BY hour ORDER BY hour;
SELECT time_bucket('1 hour', time) AS hour, AVG(temperature) FROM synthetic_data WHERE time >= '2024-01-01' AND time < '2024-01-02' GROUP BY hour ORDER BY hour;
SELECT time_bucket('1 day', time) AS day, AVG(temperature) FROM synthetic_data WHERE time >= '2024-01-01' AND time < '2024-02-01' GROUP BY day ORDER BY day;
SELECT AVG(temperature) FROM synthetic_data WHERE temperature > 35 AND pressure > 1020 AND time BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-01-07';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM synthetic_data WHERE battery_voltage < 3.5 AND status = 'WARN';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM synthetic_data WHERE status = 'FAIL' AND time BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-01-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM synthetic_data WHERE humidity > 85 AND temperature > 35;
SELECT time, AVG(temperature) OVER (ORDER BY time ROWS BETWEEN 9 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) FROM synthetic_data ORDER BY time LIMIT 5000;
SELECT time, AVG(battery_voltage) OVER (ORDER BY time ROWS BETWEEN 9 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) FROM synthetic_data ORDER BY time LIMIT 5000;
SELECT status, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, COUNT(*) AS records FROM synthetic_data GROUP BY status;
SELECT device_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, MAX(humidity) AS max_hum FROM synthetic_data GROUP BY device_id LIMIT 20;
SELECT width_bucket(humidity, 0, 100, 5) AS hum_bucket, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, COUNT(*) AS samples FROM synthetic_data GROUP BY hum_bucket ORDER BY hum_bucket;
SELECT DISTINCT ON (device_id) time, device_id, temperature FROM synthetic_data ORDER BY device_id, time DESC;
SELECT time, device_id, temperature FROM synthetic_data ORDER BY temperature DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT time, device_id, battery_voltage FROM synthetic_data ORDER BY battery_voltage ASC LIMIT 10;

nyc.sql: SELECT AVG(fare_amount) FROM nyc_data;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM nyc_data;
SELECT AVG(trip_distance) FROM nyc_data;
SELECT AVG(tip_amount) FROM nyc_data;
SELECT SUM(total_amount) FROM nyc_data;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM nyc_data WHERE tpep_pickup_datetime BETWEEN '2015-01-15 19:00:00' AND '2015-01-15 20:00:00';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM nyc_data WHERE tpep_pickup_datetime BETWEEN '2015-01-10' AND '2015-01-11';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM nyc_data WHERE tpep_pickup_datetime BETWEEN '2015-01-01' AND '2015-01-07';
SELECT AVG(fare_amount) FROM nyc_data WHERE tpep_pickup_datetime BETWEEN '2015-01-01' AND '2015-01-07';
SELECT MAX(tip_amount) FROM nyc_data WHERE tpep_pickup_datetime BETWEEN '2015-01-01' AND '2015-01-07';

SELECT date_trunc('hour', tpep_pickup_datetime) AS hour, AVG(total_amount) AS avg_revenue FROM nyc_data WHERE tpep_pickup_datetime >= '2015-01-01' AND tpep_pickup_datetime < '2015-01-02' GROUP BY hour ORDER BY hour;

SELECT time_bucket('1 hour', tpep_pickup_datetime) AS hour, AVG(total_amount) AS avg_revenue FROM nyc_data WHERE tpep_pickup_datetime >= '2015-01-01' AND tpep_pickup_datetime < '2015-01-02' GROUP BY hour ORDER BY hour;

SELECT time_bucket('1 day', tpep_pickup_datetime) AS day, SUM(total_amount) AS daily_revenue FROM nyc_data WHERE tpep_pickup_datetime >= '2015-01-01' AND tpep_pickup_datetime < '2015-02-01' GROUP BY day ORDER BY day;

SELECT time_bucket('1 day', tpep_pickup_datetime) AS day, AVG(trip_distance) AS avg_distance FROM nyc_data WHERE tpep_pickup_datetime >= '2015-01-01' AND tpep_pickup_datetime < '2015-02-01' GROUP BY day ORDER BY day;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM nyc_data WHERE trip_distance > 5 AND EXTRACT(HOUR FROM tpep_pickup_datetime) BETWEEN 22 AND 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM nyc_data WHERE tip_amount > 10 AND payment_type = 2;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM nyc_data WHERE extra > 0.5 AND total_amount > 20;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM nyc_data WHERE RateCodeID = 2;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM nyc_data WHERE trip_distance < 2 AND tip_amount < 1;
SELECT tpep_pickup_datetime, AVG(fare_amount) OVER (ORDER BY tpep_pickup_datetime ROWS BETWEEN 9 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) FROM nyc_data ORDER BY tpep_pickup_datetime LIMIT 5000;
SELECT tpep_pickup_datetime, AVG(trip_distance) OVER (ORDER BY tpep_pickup_datetime ROWS BETWEEN 9 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) FROM nyc_data ORDER BY tpep_pickup_datetime LIMIT 5000;
SELECT VendorID, COUNT(*) AS total_trips, AVG(total_amount) AS avg_fare FROM nyc_data GROUP BY VendorID;
SELECT payment_type, AVG(tip_amount) AS avg_tip, COUNT(*) AS num_trips FROM nyc_data GROUP BY payment_type;
SELECT passenger_count, AVG(total_amount) AS avg_total FROM nyc_data GROUP BY passenger_count ORDER BY passenger_count;
SELECT RateCodeID, COUNT(*) AS trips, AVG(total_amount) AS avg_fare FROM nyc_data GROUP BY RateCodeID ORDER BY RateCodeID;
SELECT DISTINCT ON (VendorID) tpep_pickup_datetime, VendorID, total_amount FROM nyc_data ORDER BY VendorID, tpep_pickup_datetime DESC;
SELECT tpep_pickup_datetime, VendorID, total_amount FROM nyc_data ORDER BY total_amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT tpep_pickup_datetime, VendorID, trip_distance FROM nyc_data ORDER BY trip_distance DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT tpep_pickup_datetime, VendorID, tip_amount FROM nyc_data ORDER BY tip_amount DESC LIMIT 10;
